desc:
With Sigma, our designers have gone the extra mile. A revision of our Marathon, with its technical-sports performance, but with more elegant and feminine lines.

You have always asked us for a model without laces but elegant, so we have implemented an adjustable velcro closure, giving cleanliness to the design. 
It's upper is made out of technical synthetic leather, giving it a soft touch, without forgetting one of our pillars: to be totally Animal Free.
